title: Loaders (WebGL shaders)
content: I'm still experimenting with shaders and I've created a couple of nice loaders. Do you think that WebGL shaders were created for something else? Maybe you're right. But it's easy to create interesting effects with them. So...
Ok. This is an experiment and I think we shouldn't do it in production. The performance is quite bad. It's better to use SVG here.
